Japanese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism headed by Kikuo Tashiro, president of the society, arrived here on Wednesday on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
